meanings.definition: The act or process of reproducing.
meanings.sent1: The teacher showed the class how to make reproductions of the painting.
meanings.sent2: The art gallery sells reproductions of famous artworks for a lower price.
meanings.sent3: The printer made so many reproductions that it ran out of ink!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a machine, constantly churning out reproductions of past events.
meanings.sent5: The factory produced high-quality reproductions of historical documents.

meanings.definition: Copies or imitations of an original work.
meanings.sent1: She bought several reproductions of the famous painting to decorate her home.
meanings.sent2: The museum gift shop sells reproductions of ancient artifacts for tourists.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's impression of the president was a hilarious reproduction.
meanings.sent4: The counterfeit money was a perfect reproduction of the real bills.
meanings.sent5: The company specializes in creating accurate reproductions of vintage furniture.
